ModMetaData.name: BattIePatch: Regimented Meme
ModMetaData.author: BattIeBear
ModMetaData.description:
V1.6
This mod adds a new Ideology meme, Regimented, which allows you to create a regimented society with strict hierarchies and roles. Designed around old militaries and mercenary companies, this meme values discipline and loyalty. All are expected to carry their weight and support their group, and the leaders are expected to be capable and driven.
